Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to a state veterans' cemetery
Summary: Relates to a state veterans' cemetery; removes certain requirements for the establishment of such cemetery.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to a state veterans' cemetery
